task.title: How to Configure a Microsoft SQL Server Connection

taskbody.prereq: The support to configure a Microsoft SQL Server connection is available in the Enterprise edition only.
taskbody.context: To configure a connection to a Microsoft SQL Server, follow these steps:

step.cmd: In the Connections panel, click the New button.

stepresult.p: The dialog box for configuring a database connection is displayed.

step.cmd: Select the SQL Server data source in the Data Source drop-down menu.

substep.cmd: Enter the URL of the SQL Server server.
substep.info: If you want to connect to the server using Windows integrated authentication, you must add ;integratedSecurity=true to the end of the URL. The URL will look like this:jdbc:sqlserver://localhost;instanceName=SQLEXPRESS;integratedSecurity=true;For integrated authentication, leave the User and Password fields empty.

substep.cmd: Enter the user name for the connection to the SQL Server.
Enter the password for the connection to the SQL Server.
